1,Complete Purchase for Selected Product with Shipping Information,"Navigate to the homepage, select a product, choose options, place an order, fill shipping details, and complete the purchase.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link brand (Apple) -> Navigate to page 'category#category/*'
Step 3: Click on link productDetails (iPhone15) -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
Step 4: Click on label colorStorageOption (128GB)
Step 5: Click on label colorStorageOption (Green)
Step 6: Click on button purchaseOption (Increased)
Step 7: Click on button purchaseOption (Buy)
Step 8: Click on link PlaceAnOrder
Step 9: Fill shipping information and proceed to payment

column2: - Step 1: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
- Step 3: Enter input value in input Email
- Step 4: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout#checkout/shipping-address'
- Step 6: Enter input value in input FirstName
- Step 8: Enter input value in input LastName
- Step 10: Enter input value in input Address
- Step 12: Enter input value in input ZipCode
- Step 14: Enter input value in input City
- Step 16: Enter input value in input State
- Step 18: Enter input value in input Phone
